section.title: CouchDB Fauxton Codebase Intellectual Property (IP) Clearance Status
Description
section.p: A group from the CouchDB user community has provided a significant amount of code for a new administration interface for CouchDB.

ul.li: The CouchDB PMC is responsible for this code/documentation.
It will be incorporated into a the CouchDB git repository for integration.
Officer or member managing donation: Jan Lehnardt (jan@apache.org)
